Color - Class in primitives
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.

Constructor to generate a color according to RGB components Each component in range 0..255 (for printed white color) or more [for lights]

Cylinder - Class in geometries
Represents a cylinder in 3D space, extending along a given axis with a specified height.

Constructs a new Cylinder with the given radius, axis, and height.
